name: discord-music-bot-monorepo
description: Full production-ready Discord music bot with real-time web dashboard

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=apps/bot" "npm run dev --workspace=apps/api" "npm run dev --workspace=apps/web"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --workspace=apps/bot" "npm run start --workspace=apps/api" "npm run start --workspace=apps/web"
